#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long LL;
map<vector<int>, vector<LL>> mp;
int D, K;

void solve(vector<int> &u) {
  if (mp.count(u)) return;
  vector<LL> r(D);
  int sum = 0;
  for (auto &x: u) sum += x;
  if (sum == 0) {
    r[0] = 1;
    mp[u] = r;
    return;
  }
  for (int i = 0; i < 10; ++i) if (u[i]) {
    --u[i];
    solve(u);
    vector<LL> &p = mp[u];
    for (int j = 0; j < D; ++j) if (p[j]) {
      int n = (j * 10 + i) % D;
      r[n] += p[j];
    }
    ++u[i];
  }
  mp[u] = r;
}

int main() {
  LL N; cin >> N >> D >> K;
  vector<int> cnt(10, 0);
  while (N) ++cnt[N % 10], N /= 10;
  solve(cnt);
  printf("%lld\n", mp[cnt][K]);
  return 0;
}
